name: nde
description: The IDE of the future, today!

scripts.build: cd .. && cp nde/service-worker.js . && rm -f index.html && rm -f now.json && npx browserfs nde/index.json && cp nde/default-redirect.html index.html
scripts.now: cd .. && cp nde/now.json . && now && now alias

author: William Hilton <wmhilton@gmail.com>
